skilltree.Name: Intelligence
skilltree.Description: Increases the maximum amount of mana by X amount.

skilltree.Name: Flamethrower
skilltree.Description: Deal X amount of fire damage in a cone in front of you

skilltree.Name: Ice Blast
skilltree.Description: Deal X amount of frost damage on a single target.

skilltree.Name: Flame Weapons
skilltree.Description:
(Requires: Engineer
Deal X amount of extra fire damage on base attacks for X amount of seconds.

skilltree.Name: Shockwave
skilltree.Description: Deal X amount of lightning damage to a single target and all targets surrounding that target.

skilltree.Name: Frost Armor
skilltree.Description:
Requires: Bulwark
Increases armor rating and frost resistance by X amount for X amount of seconds.

skilltree.Name: Improved Flame Weapons
skilltree.Description: Flame Weapons now also leaves a damage over time effect that deals X amount of fire damage over X amount of seconds.

skilltree.Name: Staff Mastery
skilltree.Description: Increases the amount of base damage dealt by staffs by X amount.

skilltree.Name: Improved Frost Armor
skilltree.Description: Frost Armor now also slows the attacks of enemy attackers by X amount.

skilltree.Name: Rain of Ice
skilltree.Description:
Requires: Rain of Arrows
Deal X amount of frost in the targeted area.

skilltree.Name: Improved Staff Mastery
skilltree.Description:
The type of staff you use now grants you an additional effect:
Fire: Your base attacks reduce the enemies fire resistance by X amount.
Frost: Increases armor rating by X amount.
Lightning: Increases base attack speed by X amount.

skilltree.Name: Lightning Weapons
skilltree.Description:
Requires: Sword Mastery
Your base attacks now have a X amount of critical hit chance for X amount of seconds.

skilltree.Name: Engineer
skilltree.Description: Increases the damage dealt by bombs by X amount.

skilltree.Name: Fan of Knives
skilltree.Description: Throw knives in a circle around you dealing X amount of piercing damage to each enemy it hits.

skilltree.Name: Elemental Warding
skilltree.Description: Increases resistance in all schools of magic by X amount.

skilltree.Name: ManaSteal
skilltree.Description:
Requires: Intelligence
Gives a X% chance to restore X amount of mana on each base attack.

skilltree.Name: Rain of Arrows
skilltree.Description: Deal X amount of piercing damage in the targeted area.

skilltree.Name: Lifesteal
skilltree.Description:
(\Requires: Brawny)\
Gives a X% chance to restore X amount of health on each base attack.

skilltree.Name: Bow Mastery
skilltree.Description: Increases the amount of base damage dealt by bows by X amount.

skilltree.Name: Sharp Eye
skilltree.Description: Increases critical strike chance by X amount.

skilltree.Name: Lightning Speed
skilltree.Description:
(\Requires: Shockwave
Increases base attack speed by X amount for X amount of time.

skilltree.Name: Improved Bow Mastery
skilltree.Description: Increases critical strike chance of bow base attacks by X amount.

skilltree.Name: Snipe
skilltree.Description: All critical strikes deal twice the amount of damage for X amount of time.

skilltree.Name: Improved Cleave
skilltree.Description:
(\Requires: Cleave)\
Cleave now stuns all targets hit for X amount of time.

skilltree.Description: Increases armor rating by X amount.

skilltree.Name: Deathblow

skilltree.Name: Brawny
skilltree.Description: Increases the maximum amount of health by X amount.

skilltree.Name: Flame Armor
skilltree.Description:
Requires: Flamethrower 
Increases armor rating and fire resistance by X amount for X amount of seconds.

skilltree.Name: Improved Deathblow
skilltree.Description: Deathblow reduces the armor rating of the targeted enemy by X amount.

skilltree.Name: Improved Fan of Knives
skilltree.Description:
Requires: Fan of Knives
Fire an aditional fan of knives

skilltree.Name: Cleave
skilltree.Description: Deal X amount of slashing damage in a cone in front of you.

skilltree.Name: Sword Mastery
skilltree.Description: Increases the amount of base damage dealt by swords by X amount.

skilltree.Name: Elemental Shield
skilltree.Description:
Requires: Elemental Warding
Gain X resistance in all schools of magic for X amount of seconds.

skilltree.Name: Mana Shield
skilltree.Description:
Requires: Intelligence
For X amount of seconds you lose mana instead of health when being attacked.

skilltree.Name: Improved Sword Mastery
skilltree.Description: Increases armor rating while using a sword by X amount.

skilltree.Name: Improved Elemental Shield
skilltree.Description: Elemental Shield now reflects back magic damage to the target.
